room_title: Escape room "Taken" by Escape Room Kingsport in Kingsport
room_description:
You and some friends are super excited about a long-anticipated weekend hiking trip in the Great Smokey Mountains National Park. After stopping at the last supply/rest area, your group is mysteriously taken captive, blindfolded and led to a very remote abandoned cabin several miles up the mountain.
Your captors are willing to give you a sporting chance to escape though. You have one hour to discover who your captors are, escape the cabin and find your way back down the mountain. It's everyone's worst nightmare...
